item.description: Let's enjoy that last of the warmer weather. If it rains, we just bring it inside! Food and fun! Pot luck, BYOB, bring any games you may want to play! Call me if you need directions or to ask questions. 860-477-0335

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Ping pong, volleyball, badminton and games at Marion's - multi-group event
